reviewGeneral.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"Summary","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Awakened Maria (AMaria) is a generalist damage dealer ranger with good performance across the board in all the content she finds herself in. AMaria sees a decent amount of use in PVE and PVP. Her kit is a combination of damage and utility, with her special being notable for the numerous effects it applies. Her high innate CRIT/ CRIT DMG rounds out the whole kit, significantly increasing her overall damage across all attacks.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"AMaria comes with a unique positioning mechanic in the form of her passive, which spawns portals at fixed locations on the map, extending slightly further than your initial deployment range limit. These portals cannot be targeted or destroyed, but when approached, they can teleport allied units a set distance across the map. The value provided by these portals will be elaborated on below.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"PVE Review","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"As a ranger with a strong kit and good stats, AMaria is a good option for most PVE stages, and infrequently sees use in Danger Close when her faction is buffed. She doesn’t get used against the Consortium worm boss, though this is hardly a criticism as many ASSRs won’t see half as much usage in PVE as AMaria.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"AMaria has an absurdly high crit stat (the highest in the game) and she gains innate 150% crit DMG from skill levels. In situations where AMaria can surefire her targets, she has one of the highest damage to cost ratios in the game. Surefire occurs when your character’s HIT% exceeds your target’s EVA%, and ensures that none of your attacks miss.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"AMaria has a notable niche in auto raid teams (Britra, Inhibitor, Kraken) due to the way her portals work. AMaria’s portals will reduce the walking time of all units deployed at the ship, and more importantly, it stacks your backline together. This ensures everyone (especially the snipers) have access to buffs from units that are only applied within a certain radius, like Awakened Shin Jia and Harim. Thanks to this, AMaria passively increases overall damage dealt on raids.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"PVP Review","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-5"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"AMaria is used periodically in PVP as a 5 cost generalist ranger. Her individual performance is marginally worse compared to other ASSRs when not accounting for the utility of her portals, but when capitalized on she can become incredibly problematic to deal with.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"AMaria’s portals can be used to make novel positioning plays, the most obvious being that with some set up you can drop frontline units directly into the enemy backline. With some creativity, portals can also be used to great effect (e.g. teleporting Jaina Kropel, comboing teleport with Albion stealth). It is worth noting that ASSRs cannot use the portals.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"AMaria’s special skill has the highest uptime stun in the game with a buff dispel and -100% incoming healing debuff attached to it. Combined, these effects lock down frontline units and turn them into stationary unhealable bodies, which helps make damage stick, and helps set up kills while they are immobile. Her ultimate is a generic nuke skill. While not specific to AMaria, her ultimate’s wide AOE often results in the edge of it clipping the enemy backline for massive damage.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"As a 5 cost ranger, AMaria isn’t difficult to slot into the team. Contrasting some ASSRs that demand teams built around them, she can manage herself fine. She excels when she is put in a team that takes advantage of the unique positioning opportunities made possible by her portals, but even without the portals she still contributes good value through her stats and skills.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"AMaria’s multiple HP-triggered backsteps make her uniquely resistant to forward deployable units, giving her insurance against many forms of backline access. The specifics go beyond the scope of this review, but keep in mind it can be very difficult to lock her down with traditional backline harassment tools. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

description.description: A Ranger who teleports her allies forward using a summoner Portal

introduction.introduction:
가르강튀아를 기동시킨 마리아 안토노프는 아군을 전방에 빠르게 이동시키거나 적을 기절시키는 능력으로 전선 유지에 능한 레인저입니다.
강습형 시공 가속기, 가르강튀아는 마리아 안토노프가 지닌 전이 능력과 연계해 그 위력을 극대화시켜 주는 전략 병기입니다.
하지만 근본적인 설계 결함을 간직하고 있기 때문에, 사용자는 가르강튀아가 기동하는 동안 큰 부하를 짊어져야 합니다. 이를 상쇄하기 위해 연구진은 마리아가 전달한 생명공학 기술을 차용, 육체의 연령대를 변경함으로써 대응하였습니다.
젊은 시절의 모습으로 나타난 마리아는 병사들에게 현대전의 여신으로 비춰지기에 충분합니다.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Distorts the space in front of her, dealing damage to the closest enemy.

Creates a portal at the allies’ rearmost area upon deployment. Allies within 2 seconds of being deployed near the portal (excluding Awakened units and Towers) are teleported 40% of the battlefield (60% in Gauntlet) while gaining 10% DMG RDC for 8 seconds. The portal vanishes upon Maria’s death.

level5.level5: Maria gains +100% CRIT DMG and teleports back to the rearmost area of the map whenever her HP falls below 70%, and 40%.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Distorts space and deals AoE damage to the target and nearby enemies. Immediately after the attack, enemies within range are stunned for 4 seconds and Incoming Healing is reduced by 100% (excluding Bosses). The stunned target receives additional damage equal to 20% of its Max HP (excluding Bosses).

level5.level5: Damaged targets have one non-permanent buff removed, and the duration for Stun and Incoming Healing reduction is changed to 8 seconds.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Creates a massive portal and receives support fire from her fleet in other space, dealing AoE damage to the target and nearby enemies as well as removing Barriers.
